document_data.name: Unidentified duergar fiddler
document_data.mainbody: An '''unidentified duergar fiddler''' of [[Zortagra]] was in [[Elventree]] during the late 1480s DR.
document_data.History:
A duergar fiddler was afflicted by the [[demon lord]]'s madness in the late 1480s DR. For unknown reasons, she went to the village of Elventree in [[Cormanthor]] and there started to play a madness-spreading melody during a celebration in honor of [[Mielikki]]. Thanks to some adventurers, she was stopped before too much damage was done.

Later, [[Elanil Elassidil]] hired the adventurers that had stopped her to investigate the matter in the [[Underdark]].{{Cite adventurers league/The Malady of Elventree|11}}
